org.jclouds.openstack.nova.v2_0.extensions

Interface FloatingIPClient


  • public interface FloatingIPClient
    Provides synchronous access to Floating IPs.

    Author:
    Jeremy Daggett
    See Also:
    FloatingIPAsyncClient
